title: toc
text:
toc

reference

low- & high-res. pseoduobulks
from scRNA-seq reference data

setup

add core-level metadata
write polygons to .parquet
format into SingleCellExperiment
negative & false codes as altExps

filtering

based on cell-level metrics
& distance to FOV borders

signatures

MSigDB, in-house, public
& pan-cancer T cell atlas

signaling

using COMMOT

clustering

semi-supervised for all but stromal
split into NK/T, myeloid stromal & tumor cells

subclustering’’

semi-supervised for all but stromal
subset-specific feature selection

contexts

cluster cells based on composition
of 20um radial neighborhoods

processing

pooling of results into single object
dimensionality reduction (joint & split)

EDA clustering
EDA signatures
EDA signaling

nomenclature

core identifiers = patient + replicate + tissue + group

patient: 01-12; replicate: 1 or 2 if any, 0 otherwise
(e.g., 071 = patient 7, 1st rep; 020 = patient 2, only rep)
tissue:

EY = eye
LN = lymph node
SO = soft tissue
NP = nasopharyngeal

group:

m = mantle
n = nodal
d = diffuse

source("code/_utils.R")
bp <- MulticoreParam(8)





sce <- readRDS("outs/fil.rds")
sig <- readRDS("outs/sig.rds")
ccc <- readRDS("outs/ccc.rds")
ctx <- readRDS("outs/ctx.rds")
fqs <- readRDS("outs/fqs.rds")
ist <- readRDS("outs/lv1.rds")
jst <- readRDS("outs/lv2.rds")




idx <- names(kid <- ist$clust)
sce$lv1 <- kid[match(colnames(sce), idx)]
kid <- lapply(jst, \(.) .$clust)
idx <- names(kid <- unlist(unname(kid)))
sce$lv2 <- kid[match(colnames(sce), idx)]
colData(sce)$fqs <- fqs[colnames(sce), ]
sce$ctx <- ctx[colnames(sce)]
colData(sig) <- colData(sce)
colData(ccc) <- colData(sce)
altExp(sce, "UCell") <- sig
altExp(sce, "COMMOT") <- ccc






set.seed(251206)
sce <- logNormCounts(sce)
tbl <- modelGeneVar(sce)
sel <- getTopHVGs(tbl, n=2e3)
sel <- rownames(sce) %in% sel
rowData(sce)$sel <- sel
sce <- runPCA(sce, subset_row=sel)
sce <- runUMAP(sce, dimred="PCA", n_dimred=20)


set.seed(251207)
idx <- split(colnames(sce), sce$lv1)
names(ids) <- ids <- names(idx)
lys <- bplapply(ids, \(.) {
    sel <- rownames(jst[[.]]$profiles)
    sel <- rownames(sce) %in% sel
    rowData(sce)[[.]] <- sel
    sce <- runPCA(sce[, idx[[.]]], subset_row=sel)
    runUMAP(sce, dimred="PCA", n_dimred=10)
}, BPPARAM=bp)

    b <- switch(a, PCA="PCB", "UMAQ")
    dr <- lapply(lys, reducedDim, a)
    dr <- do.call(rbind, dr)
    dr <- dr[colnames(sce), ]
    reducedDim(sce, b) <- dr
}

rowData(sce) <- cbind(rowData(sce), sel)







saveRDS(sce, "outs/pro.rds")

# restrict to tumor
sig <- altExp(sce, "UCell")
sel <- rowData(sig)$typ != "t-atlas"
sub <- sig[sel, sig$lv2 == "tum"]
# average by bin
xs <- seq(-(dx <- 0.05), 1+dx, dx*2)
fq <- cut(.q(sub$fqs$tum), breaks=xs)
fq <- xs[as.integer(fq)]+dx
fq <- factor(fq, sort(unique(fq)))
mu <- aggregateAcrossCells(sub,
    ids=fq, statistics="mean",
    use.assay.type=assayNames(sub)[1])
df <- data.frame(fq=mu$ids, t(assay(mu)), check.names=FALSE)
# scale across bins
fd <- df |>
    pivot_longer(-fq) |>
    group_by(name) |>
    mutate_at("value", .z)
# order by peak
yo <- fd |>
    group_by(name) |>
    slice_max(value, with_ties=FALSE) |>
    arrange(fq, value) |>
    pull(name) |> rev()
# plotting
ggplot(fd, aes(fq, name, fill=value)) +
    geom_tile() + 
    scale_fill_gradientn(
        "z-scaled\nmean score",
        colors=rev(pals::brewer.puor(9)),
        limits=c(-2.5, 2.5), breaks=seq(-2, 2, 2)) +
    labs(x="tumor density", y=NULL) +
    coord_equal(2/3, expand=FALSE) + 
    scale_y_discrete(limits=yo) +
    .thm_fig_c("minimal") + theme(
        axis.text.x=element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.x=element_blank())
